channel.title: Model-Based Reinforcement Learning on Kevin Roice
channel.description: Recent content in Model-Based Reinforcement Learning on Kevin Roice

item.title: Goal-Space Planning with Subgoal Models
item.description: We propose a long-horizon background-planning algorithm for online RL. This used compressed subgoal models (abstract in state & time) for faster long-term decision making & smarter value propagation.
